verses.verse: Then Eliashib <WH475> the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548> rose up <WH6965> with his brethren <WH251> the priests <WH3548>, and they builded <WH1129> the sheep <WH6629> gate <WH8179>; they sanctified <WH6942> it <WH5975>, and set up the doors <WH1817> of it <WH4026>; even unto the tower of Hammeah <WH3968> they sanctified <WH6942> it <WH4026>, unto the tower of Hananel <WH2606>.
And next unto him <WH3027> builded <WH1129> the men <WH582> of Jericho <WH3405>. And next to them builded <WH1129> Zaccur <WH2139> the son <WH1121> of Imri <WH566>.

And the fish <WH1709> gate <WH8179> did the sons <WH1121> of Hassenaah <WH5570> build <WH1129>; they laid the beams <WH7136> thereof <WH5975>, and set up the doors <WH1817> thereof <WH4514>, the bolts thereof <WH1280>, and the bars thereof.

And next unto them <WH3027> repaired <WH2388> Meremoth <WH4822> the son <WH1121> of Uriah <WH223>, the son <WH1121> of Hakkoz <WH6976>. And next unto them <WH3027> repaired <WH2388> Meshullam <WH4918> the son <WH1121> of Berechiah <WH1296>, the son <WH1121> of Meshezabel <WH4898>. And next unto them <WH3027> repaired <WH2388> Zadok <WH6659> the son <WH1121> of Baana <WH1195>.
And next unto them <WH3027> the Tekoites <WH8621> repaired <WH2388>; but their nobles <WH117> put <WH935> not their necks <WH6677> to the work <WH5656> of their lord <WH113>.

And the old <WH3465> gate <WH8179> repaired <WH2388> Joiada <WH3111> the son <WH1121> of Paseah <WH6454> and Meshullam <WH4918> the son <WH1121> of Besodeiah <WH1152>; they laid the beams <WH7136> thereof <WH5975>, and set up the doors <WH1817> thereof <WH4514>, and the bolts thereof <WH1280>, and the bars thereof.

And next unto them <WH3027> repaired <WH2388> Melatiah <WH4424> the Gibeonite <WH1393>, and Jadon <WH3036> the Meronothite <WH4824>, the men <WH582> of Gibeon <WH1391>, and of Mizpah <WH4709>, that appertained to the throne <WH3678> of the governor <WH6346> beyond <WH5676> the River <WH5104>.

Next unto him <WH3027> repaired <WH2388> Uzziel <WH5816> the son <WH1121> of Harhaiah <WH2736>, goldsmiths <WH6884>. And next unto him <WH3027> repaired <WH2388> Hananiah <WH2608> one <WH1121> of the perfumers <WH7546>, and they fortified <WH5800> Jerusalem <WH3389> even unto the broad <WH7342> wall <WH2346>.
And next unto them <WH3027> repaired <WH2388> Rephaiah <WH7509> the son <WH1121> of Hur <WH2354>, the ruler <WH8269> of half <WH2677> the district <WH6418> of Jerusalem <WH3389>.

And next unto them <WH3027> repaired <WH2388> Jedaiah <WH3042> the son <WH1121> of Harumaph <WH2739>, over against his house <WH1004>. And next unto him <WH3027> repaired <WH2388> Hattush <WH2407> the son <WH1121> of Hashabneiah <WH2813>.

Malchijah <WH4441> the son <WH1121> of Harim <WH2766>, and Hasshub <WH2815> the son <WH1121> of Pahath-moab <WH6355>, repaired <WH2388> another <WH8145> portion <WH4060>, and the tower <WH4026> of the furnaces <WH8574>.

And next unto him <WH3027> repaired <WH2388> Shallum <WH7967> the son <WH1121> of Hallohesh <WH3873>, the ruler <WH8269> of half <WH2677> the district <WH6418> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, he and his daughters <WH1323>.

The valley <WH1516> gate <WH8179> repaired <WH2388> Hanun <WH2586>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Zanoah <WH2182>; they built <WH1129> it <WH5975>, and set up the doors <WH1817> thereof <WH4514>, the bolts thereof <WH1280>, and the bars thereof <WH505>, and a thousand cubits <WH520> of the wall <WH2346> unto the dung <WH830> gate <WH8179>.

And the dung <WH830> gate <WH8179> repaired <WH2388> Malchijah <WH4441> the son <WH1121> of Rechab <WH7394>, the ruler <WH8269> of the district <WH6418> of Beth-haccherem <WH1021>; he built <WH1129> it <WH5975>, and set up the doors <WH1817> thereof <WH4514>, the bolts thereof <WH1280>, and the bars thereof.

And the fountain <WH5869> gate <WH8179> repaired <WH2388> Shallun <WH7968> the son <WH1121> of Col-hozeh <WH3626>, the ruler <WH8269> of the district <WH6418> of Mizpah <WH4709>; he built <WH1129> it <WH2926>, and covered it <WH5975>, and set up the doors <WH1817> thereof <WH4514>, the bolts thereof <WH1280>, and the bars thereof <WH2346>, and the wall of the pool <WH1295> of Shelah <WH7975> by the king <WH4428>'s garden <WH1588>, even unto the stairs <WH4609> that go down <WH3381> from the city <WH5892> of David <WH1732>.

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Nehemiah <WH5166> the son <WH1121> of Azbuk <WH5802>, the ruler <WH8269> of half <WH2677> the district <WH6418> of Beth-zur <WH1049>, unto the place over against the sepulchres <WH6913> of David <WH1732>, and unto the pool <WH1295> that was made <WH6213>, and unto the house <WH1004> of the mighty men <WH1368>.

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> the Levites <WH3881>, Rehum <WH7348> the son <WH1121> of Bani <WH1137>. Next unto him <WH3027> repaired <WH2388> Hashabiah <WH2811>, the ruler <WH8269> of half <WH2677> the district <WH6418> of Keilah <WH7084>, for his district <WH6418>.
After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> their brethren <WH251>, Bavvai <WH942> the son <WH1121> of Henadad <WH2582>, the ruler <WH8269> of half <WH2677> the district <WH6418> of Keilah <WH7084>.

And next to him <WH3027> repaired <WH2388> Ezer <WH5829> the son <WH1121> of Jeshua <WH3442>, the ruler <WH8269> of Mizpah <WH4709>, another <WH8145> portion <WH4060>, over against the ascent <WH5927> to the armory <WH5402> at the turning of the wall <WH4740>.

After <WH310> him Baruch <WH1263> the son <WH1121> of Zabbai <WH2079> earnestly <WH2734> repaired <WH2388> another <WH8145> portion <WH4060>, from the turning <WH4740> of the wall unto the door <WH6607> of the house <WH1004> of Eliashib <WH475> the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548>.

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Meremoth <WH4822> the son <WH1121> of Uriah <WH223> the son <WH1121> of Hakkoz <WH6976> another <WH8145> portion <WH4060>, from the door <WH6607> of the house <WH1004> of Eliashib <WH475> even to the end <WH8503> of the house <WH1004> of Eliashib <WH475>.
And after <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> the priests <WH3548>, the men <WH582> of the Plain <WH3603>.

After <WH310> them repaired <WH2388> Benjamin <WH1144> and Hasshub <WH2815> over against their house <WH1004>. After <WH310> them repaired <WH2388> Azariah <WH5838> the son <WH1121> of Maaseiah <WH4641> the son <WH1121> of Ananiah <WH6055> beside <WH681> his own house <WH1004>.

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Binnui <WH1131> the son <WH1121> of Henadad <WH2582> another <WH8145> portion <WH4060>, from the house <WH1004> of Azariah <WH5838> unto the turning <WH4740> of the wall <WH6438>, and unto the corner.

Palal <WH6420> the son <WH1121> of Uzai <WH186> repaired over against the turning <WH4740> of the wall <WH4026>, and the tower that standeth out <WH3318> from the upper <WH5945> house <WH1004> of the king <WH4428>, which is by the court <WH2691> of the guard <WH4307>. After <WH310> him Pedaiah <WH6305> the son <WH1121> of Parosh repaired <WH6551>.
(Now the Nethinim <WH5411> dwelt <WH3427> in Ophel <WH6077>, unto the place over against the water <WH4325> gate <WH8179> toward the east <WH4217>, and the tower <WH4026> that standeth out <WH3318>.)

After <WH310> him the Tekoites <WH8621> repaired <WH2388> another <WH8145> portion <WH4060>, over against the great <WH1419> tower <WH4026> that standeth out <WH3318>, and unto the wall <WH2346> of Ophel <WH6077>.
Above the horse <WH5483> gate <WH8179> repaired <WH2388> the priests <WH3548>, every one <WH376> over against <WH5048> his own house <WH1004>.

After <WH310> them repaired <WH2388> Zadok <WH6659> the son <WH1121> of Immer <WH564> over against his own house <WH1004>. And after <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Shemaiah <WH8098> the son <WH1121> of Shecaniah <WH7935>, the keeper <WH8104> of the east <WH4217> gate <WH8179>.

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Hananiah <WH2608> the son <WH1121> of Shelemiah <WH8018>, and Hanun <WH2586> the sixth <WH8345> son <WH1121> of Zalaph <WH6764>, another <WH8145> portion <WH4060>. After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Meshullam <WH4918> the son <WH1121> of Berechiah <WH1296> over against his chamber <WH5393>.

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Malchijah <WH4441> one <WH1121> of the goldsmiths <WH6885> unto the house <WH1004> of the Nethinim <WH5411>, and of the merchants <WH7402>, over against the gate <WH8179> of Hammiphkad <WH4663>, and to the ascent <WH5944> of the corner <WH6438>.
And between the ascent <WH5944> of the corner <WH6438> and the sheep <WH6629> gate <WH8179> repaired <WH2388> the goldsmiths <WH6884> and the merchants <WH7402>.
